name: Shaded Cuban With A Nut
description: give min 14 days before trying this one is a definite keeper in my tobaccos
author: JJ1977

reviews.text: Great mix. Cuban supreme is an awesome , relatively neutral tobacco, pretty dry and earthy with some light sweetness at the end. The shade brings in a cigar leaf flavor with some leathery, chocolate back notes. The walnut comes in to give some moisture and mouthfeel to what would be two otherwise dry flavors. This is a great mix that I find myself coming back to daily.
